mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.drug_code AS "drugCode", a.drug_spec AS "drugSpec", a.firm_id AS "firmId", a.units AS "units", a.trade_price AS "tradePrice", a.retail_price AS "retailPrice", a.amount_per_package AS "amountPerPackage", a.min_spec AS "minSpec", a.min_units AS "minUnits", a.start_date AS "startDate", a.stop_date AS "stopDate", a.memos AS "memos", a.class_on_inp_rcpt AS "classOnInpRcpt", a.class_on_outp_rcpt AS "classOnOutpRcpt", a.class_on_reckoning AS "classOnReckoning", a.subj_code AS "subjCode", a.class_on_mr AS "classOnMr", a.hlimit_price AS "hlimitPrice", a.price_class AS "priceClass", a.pass_no AS "passNo", a.gmp AS "gmp", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: select distinct a.drug_code ,a.drug_name from drug_name_dict a ,drug_price_list b where a.drug_code = b.drug_code AND b.org_id = #{0} and b.drug_code like #{1} || '%'

SELECT DISTINCT a.drug_code AS "drugCode", a.drug_name AS "drugName", a.toxi_property AS "toxiProperty", a.drug_indicator AS "drugIndicator", a.input_code AS "inputCode", a.drug_form as drugForm, a.dose_per_unit AS "dosePerUnit", a.dose_units AS "doseUnits" FROM drug_dict a where a.del_flag = '0' AND (a.stop_flag is null or a.stop_flag = '0') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM drug_price_list t WHERE a.drug_code=t.drug_code AND t.del_flag = '0' AND t.org_id=#{orgId} AND t.start_date <= sysdate AND (t.stop_date IS NULL OR t.stop_date >= sysdate) )
and (upper(a.drug_code) like upper(#{q})||'%' or a.drug_name like #{q}||'%' or upper(a.input_code) like upper(#{q})||'%')
ORDER BY a.drug_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drug_price_list( id, drug_code, drug_spec, firm_id, units, trade_price, retail_price, amount_per_package, min_spec, min_units, start_date, stop_date, memos, class_on_inp_rcpt, class_on_outp_rcpt, class_on_reckoning, subj_code, class_on_mr, hlimit_price, price_class, pass_no, gmp, org_id, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{drugCode}, #{drugSpec}, #{firmId}, #{units}, #{tradePrice}, #{retailPrice}, #{amountPerPackage}, #{minSpec}, #{minUnits}, #{startDate}, #{stopDate}, #{memos}, #{classOnInpRcpt}, #{classOnOutpRcpt}, #{classOnReckoning}, #{subjCode}, #{classOnMr}, #{hlimitPrice}, #{priceClass}, #{passNo}, #{gmp}, #{orgId}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE drug_price_list SET drug_code = #{drugCode}, drug_spec = #{drugSpec}, firm_id = #{firmId}, units = #{units}, trade_price = #{tradePrice}, retail_price = #{retailPrice}, amount_per_package = #{amountPerPackage}, min_spec = #{minSpec}, min_units = #{minUnits}, start_date = #{startDate}, stop_date = #{stopDate}, memos = #{memos}, class_on_inp_rcpt = #{classOnInpRcpt}, class_on_outp_rcpt = #{classOnOutpRcpt}, class_on_reckoning = #{classOnReckoning}, subj_code = #{subjCode}, class_on_mr = #{classOnMr}, hlimit_price = #{hlimitPrice}, price_class = #{priceClass}, pass_no = #{passNo}, gmp = #{gmp}, org_id = #{orgId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
